Headline: #26 South Shore Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near 106th/Buffalo
ShortDescription: NB 26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 106th, Muskegon, Commercial, 100th, Ave. L, and 106th due to, street blockage near 106th/Buffalo.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 106th, Muskegon, Commercial, 100th, Ave. L, and 106th due to, street blockage near 106th/Buffalo.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
